#2BS: @USEmbassyMNE Uyehara speaks about historic importance of #Montenegro's prospective #NATO membership. https://t.co/LXPoqjcHki
PM: #2BS has become a brand in the region&beyond as a forum for constructive debate on top security&political topics https://t.co/8WpcoN5pYn
#2BS PM: Formula of our success is that our partners & friends support our ambitions & efforts we put into reforms & promoting democracy
#2BS PM Đukanović: #Montenegro will sign Accession Protocol with #NATO this month & soon become full fledged member. https://t.co/DN4kMGX1MM
#2BS PM: Recent attacks warn that everyone is vulnerable to threats & no one can stand alone. We must do our part in solving shared issues.
Queen Rania: The Syrian refugees I met are experiencing something worse than death https://t.co/IASkyodLH6
#2BS PM: I believe Allies recognise our efforts & will quickly ratify the Protocol, making #Montenegro a NATO member this time 2017.
#2BS PM: Warsaw Summit will discuss main security topics at top level, & #Montenegro will be at the table for the first time as an invitee.
#2BS PM: #Montenegro’s #NATO invite is one of last decade’s top achievements & I believe it will give wind to sails of our EU integration.
#2BS PM: #NATO & #EU accession efforts are complementary processes, largely same values & countries members of both. https://t.co/j5uY0e0fSW
#2BS #Montenegro PM Đukanović: Without stable Western Balkans & its integration Europe as a whole cannot be stable. https://t.co/w3SH7HFkUw
#2BS PM: #Montenegro’s membership will contribute to European stability & MNE will ensure NATO doors remain open to rest of the region.
